QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Bloodmyst Isle!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Vorkhan the Elekk Herder at Kessel's Crossing.$B$BThe people of Bloodmyst need your help to deal with treacherous blood elves and dangerous creatures loose on the island. You can reach Kessel's Crossing on Bloodmyst Isle by taking the bridge north from Azuremyst Isle.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Vorkhan the Elekk Herder at Kessel's Crossing on Bloodmyst Isle.
QuestData.RewardText: So you're here to help? Well, there's plenty to do...
